snippet: The United States Justice Department has seized $500,000 traced to former President Chun Doo-hwan of South Korea, who was convicted in a South Korean court in 1997 of accepting more than $200 million in bribes while in office from 1980 to 1988.
lead_paragraph: The United States Justice Department has seized $500,000 traced to former President Chun Doo-hwan of South Korea, who was convicted in a South Korean court in 1997 of accepting more than $200 million in bribes while in office from 1980 to 1988.

headline.main: U.S. Seizes Assets Traced to South Korean Ex-President
headline.print_headline: South Korea: U.S. Seizes Assets Traced to Ex-President
